docs.snippet: UAB football coach Garrick McGee has stepped down, and a person familiar with the situation tells The Associated Press that he has agreed to become Bobby Petrino's offensive coordinator at Louisville....
docs.lead_paragraph: UAB football coach Garrick McGee has stepped down, and a person familiar with the situation tells The Associated Press that he has agreed to become Bobby Petrino's offensive coordinator at Louisville.

headline.main: AP Source: UAB Coach McGee Leaves for Louisville
headline.print_headline: AP Source: UAB Coach McGee Leaves for Louisville

docs.snippet: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford is challenging Canada's federal government to decriminalize marijuana....

docs.snippet: Pepe Mel, the charismatic Spaniard who led Real Betis to seventh place in La Liga last season and writes mystery novels in his spare time, was named manager of English Premier League strugglers West Bromwich Albion on Thursday....

docs.snippet: The Washington Redskins named Jay Gruden as head coach, hoping the former Cincinnati Bengals offensive coordinator can turn around struggling team that went 3-13 this season, according to a report on the NFL's website on Thursday....
